text: On 13 February 2025, a vehicle-ramming attack happened at a protest by the trade union ver.di in Munich, Germany. The attack left at least 28 people injured, some critically. The suspected driver was 24-year-old Afghan Farhad Noori. He was arrested at the scene. The motive for the crime is unknown. ==References== Category:2025 crimes in Europe Category:February 2025 events Category:21st century in Munich Category:2020s in Germany Category:2020s disasters in Germany Category:Crime in Germany Category:Transport disasters in Europe
title: 2025 Munich car attack
